title: Toys and games market : market segmentation by value 2009
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Market share for 7 number of Names.
Name Other has the highest Market share and Plush toys has the lowest Market share.
The Market share of Name Other is 5.98% larger than the minimum value at Plush toys.
min_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Market share for 7 number of Names.
Name Other has the highest Market share and Plush toys has the lowest Market share.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Market share for 7 number of Names.
Name Other has the highest Market share and Plush toys has the lowest Market share.
The Market share of Name Other is 5.98% larger than the minimum value at Plush toys.
max_summary: This is a bar chart representing Name in the x axis and Market share in the y axis.
The Market share is appeared to be the highest at Name Other and lowest at Name Plush toys.
Second maximum Market share is found at Name Infant/Pre-school toys.
There is a difference of 25.4 between the maximum Name Other and minimum Name Plush toys.
Market share at Name Other is 30.5 , second place is Infant/Pre-school toys at 16.2, and thirdly is Activity toys at 15.1.
The lowest value 5.1 at Plush toys is almost 2.13 times smaller than the average value 14.29.
The Market share is 100.0 if we add up values of all Names.
